name: House Portrait
description:
Order an original watercolor painting of your home, or surprise someone with the gift of a portrait! I can work from your photos, or I will gladly take photos myself if the property is near Boston, Massachusetts USA. Tell me what you like best about your house or yard. You may also order prints and notecards of your portrait.

Watercolor, 8"x10" image, matted and framed to 11"x14". Includes framing by artist. Other sizes, media, and pricing available, just ask.

See www.LoisMitchellArt.com for more examples.

50% deposit required. Contact me to get started!

name: People or Pet Portrait, framed size 11"x14"
description:
Commission an original piece of art! They make great gifts. Perhaps you envision a charcoal drawing, watercolor painting, or pencil drawing based on a favorite photograph? Extra prints and notecards will be available of your commissioned piece. 

Specify watercolor, charcoal, or pencil or ask for suggested media. Includes framing by artist. Other sizes and pricing are available, just ask.

See www.LoisMitchellArt.com for more examples.

50% deposit required. Contact me to get started!
